title: Chiropractor Stillwater OK | Reese Chiropractic
author: - Nick
description: Our Chiropractors Stillwater Dr. J. Weston ("Heath") Reese and Dr. Ashton Shelton have openings for new patients. Call us today! We accept most insurance plans.
cleaned_text: Care for Your Entire Family at Reese Chiropractic From helping newborns to grandparents, we believe that chiropractic is a benefit to all. [ Our Stillwater Chiropractors Dr. Heath Reese](/dr-j-weston-heath-reese/) [ and ](https://www.reesechiro.net/about-us/) [Dr. Ashton N. Shelton](/dr-ashton-shelton/) see all ages and offer pediatric care, pregnancy care and sports care. We've gathered the most effective types of therapy under one roof to help you heal. In addition to chiropractic, we provide dry needling, instrument-assisted soft tissue mobilization, electric muscle stimulation, cupping and cold laser therapy.
